dashboard.description: Visualization of the Component and Integration Promotion Pipelines

targets.query: select release,  promo_name, distro, latest_build_date, promotion_details, last(aggregate_hash) from "dlrn-promotion" where ("promo_name" = 'current-tripleo' AND "distro" = 'centos-9' AND "release" = 'master')

select component,  promo_name,  latest_build_date, promotion_details, last(aggregate_hash) from "dlrn-promotion" where ("release" = 'master' AND "component" = 'baremetal' AND "promo_name" = 'promoted-components' AND "distro" = 'centos-9' )

select component,  promo_name,  latest_build_date, promotion_details, last(aggregate_hash) from "dlrn-promotion" where ("release" = 'master' AND "component" = 'cinder' AND "promo_name" = 'promoted-components' AND "distro" = 'centos-9' )

select component,  promo_name,  latest_build_date, promotion_details, last(aggregate_hash) from "dlrn-promotion" where ("release" = 'master' AND "component" = 'clients' AND "promo_name" = 'promoted-components' AND "distro" = 'centos-9' )

select component,  promo_name,  latest_build_date, promotion_details, last(aggregate_hash) from "dlrn-promotion" where ("release" = 'master' AND "component" = 'cloudops' AND "promo_name" = 'promoted-components' AND "distro" = 'centos-9' )

select component,  promo_name,  latest_build_date, promotion_details, last(aggregate_hash) from "dlrn-promotion" where ("release" = 'master' AND "component" = 'common' AND "promo_name" = 'promoted-components' AND "distro" = 'centos-9' )

select component,  promo_name,  latest_build_date, promotion_details, last(aggregate_hash) from "dlrn-promotion" where ("release" = 'master' AND "component" = 'compute' AND "promo_name" = 'promoted-components' AND "distro" = 'centos-9' )

select component,  promo_name,  latest_build_date, promotion_details, last(aggregate_hash) from "dlrn-promotion" where ("release" = 'master' AND "component" = 'glance' AND "promo_name" = 'promoted-components' AND "distro" = 'centos-9' )

select component,  promo_name,  latest_build_date, promotion_details, last(aggregate_hash) from "dlrn-promotion" where ("release" = 'master' AND "component" = 'manila' AND "promo_name" = 'promoted-components' AND "distro" = 'centos-9' )

select component,  promo_name,  latest_build_date, promotion_details, last(aggregate_hash) from "dlrn-promotion" where ("release" = 'master' AND "component" = 'network' AND "promo_name" = 'promoted-components' AND "distro" = 'centos-9' )

select component,  promo_name,  latest_build_date, promotion_details, last(aggregate_hash) from "dlrn-promotion" where ("release" = 'master' AND "component" = 'octavia' AND "promo_name" = 'promoted-components' AND "distro" = 'centos-9' )

select component,  promo_name,  latest_build_date, promotion_details, last(aggregate_hash) from "dlrn-promotion" where ("release" = 'master' AND "component" = 'security' AND "promo_name" = 'promoted-components' AND "distro" = 'centos-9' )

select component,  promo_name,  latest_build_date, promotion_details, last(aggregate_hash) from "dlrn-promotion" where ("release" = 'master' AND "component" = 'swift' AND "promo_name" = 'promoted-components' AND "distro" = 'centos-9' )

select component,  promo_name,  latest_build_date, promotion_details, last(aggregate_hash) from "dlrn-promotion" where ("release" = 'master' AND "component" = 'tempest' AND "promo_name" = 'promoted-components' AND "distro" = 'centos-9' )

select component,  promo_name,  latest_build_date, promotion_details, last(aggregate_hash) from "dlrn-promotion" where ("release" = 'master' AND "component" = 'tripleo' AND "promo_name" = 'promoted-components' AND "distro" = 'centos-9' )

select component,  promo_name,  latest_build_date, promotion_details, last(aggregate_hash) from "dlrn-promotion" where ("release" = 'master' AND "component" = 'ui' AND "promo_name" = 'promoted-components' AND "distro" = 'centos-9' )

select component,  promo_name,  latest_build_date, promotion_details, last(aggregate_hash) from "dlrn-promotion" where ("release" = 'master' AND "component" = 'validation' AND "promo_name" = 'promoted-components' AND "distro" = 'centos-9' )

panels.title: Master Components: Days since last promotion

panels.description: Bars represent successful promotions to current-tripleo for master.

targets.query: SELECT  count("aggregate_hash") FROM "dlrn-promotion" WHERE ("release" = 'master' AND "promo_name" = 'current-tripleo' AND "distro" = 'centos-9') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(24h), "name" fill(0)

panels.title: Promotions for CentOS-9 master tripleo ci ( current-tripleo )

panels.description: List of the latest failing integration / promotion  jobs.

targets.query: SELECT "job_name","status","criteria","logs","duration","failure_reason","test_hash","distro"  FROM "autogen"."jobs_result" WHERE ("job_type" = 'integration' AND "release" = 'master' AND "distro" = 'centos-9') AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Master Integration periodic jobs

panels.description: Bars represent successful promotions to current-tripleo-rdo for master. Default time is the last 2 weeks.

targets.query: SELECT  count("aggregate_hash") FROM "dlrn-promotion" WHERE ("release" = 'master' AND "promo_name" = 'current-tripleo-rdo' AND "distro" = 'centos-9') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(24h), "name" fill(0)

panels.title: Promotions for CentOS-9 master RDO ( current-tripleo-rdo )

dashboard.title: Centos 9 Upstream and RDO promotions
